    • Method Detail

      • initStatesMachine

        public static void initStatesMachine(Input in)
        Creation of the states machine. It starts on the game's intro
        Parameters:
        in - input

      • stateMachine

        public static void stateMachine()
        One iteration of the states machine. An iteration represents a frame of the game. This method will be called from GameLoop object.

      • render

        public static void render(Graphics g)
        Render a frame
        Parameters:
        g - graphics in which to paint

                            boolean persist)
        Changes room
        Parameters:
        st - state to go to
        persist - true if the room needn't be cleaned
